text: Tunji Bello is a Journalist, a lawyer, environment activist and political scientist, and he was born July 1,1961. He just finished is term as the Commissioner for Environment and Water Resources under the Babajide Sanwo-Olu Administration in Lagos State on May, 2023 and He is from Lagos state in Nigeria. == Educational Background == He has a university certificate from the University of Ibadan where he studied Political Science and graduated in 1984..In 1987,he studied further and got a Masters certificate in international law and diplomacy from University of Lagos. In 2000, he got another degree in Law from the university of Lagos. == References == Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian activists Category:People from Lagos State
title: Tunji Bello
